name: Burger King: Fun With Snoopy!
description:
Dive into new adventures with Snoopy, Woodstock and rest of the Peanuts gang! Burger King and Peanuts have teamed up to bring you this fun-filled app that includes both 2D & AR games and videos with a focus on caring for each other and our planet. Get your Peanuts books at Burger King restaurants to unlock all the fun!

- Watch how Snoopy collects and recycles used containers to build a new home for Woodstock’s friends.
- Learn about composting from Lucy to help your garden grow better than ever before.
- Watch as Charlie Brown walks Sally through a day in the life of caring for his beloved beagle.
- Snoopy and Charlie Brown teach us to grow kindness by doing something for others.
- Whether it’s playing sports or jumping rope like Lucy and Snoopy, the gang will show you how to take time to move your own way.
- Dr. Snoopy reminds us to take care of each other when he helps the rest of the Peanuts gang feel better.

Snoopy and the Peanuts gang are here to help you learn how to take care of each other and the environment and how to make a difference!
